translation.Message_0_Page_0: <name_char>. That's a great name. I'm <color=mythical>Admiral Sir Thomas</color>, the head of the <color=blue>West Coalition Navy</color>. We serve around the North Atlantic, rescuing surivors and civilizing unstable areas.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: We prefer to focus our efforts on Ireland, considering the amount of bandit and military factions. Have you heard of the <color=red>IFR</color>? They're a prevelant bandit cell that wishes to reunite Ireland. Bunch of bad dudes.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: Alright, if you would like to join, please go to <color=legendary>Captain Isaac</color>. He'd run you through a mission and if you do it you'll be recruited as an <color=uncommon>Ensign</color>.
